Web Development Portfolio

Real-world projects and experimental builds that show what I can create for your business. Whether you need a bold landing page, a custom workflow tool, or a scalable web app — I’ll help you launch it with confidence.

Real Projects for Real Clients

GoBasile – Repair Shop CRM & Marketplace Platform

GoBasile is a full-stack B2B web application and marketplace platform tailored for tech repair businesses. The platform features ticket tracking, customer relationship management (CRM), inventory control, and quoting tools—all in one responsive interface.

Tools Used

ReactFlaskPostgreSQLTailwind CSS
Dramatis – “Third Space” Lifestyle Brand Website

Dramatis is a lifestyle brand inspired by board games, coffee culture, and the light side of Star Wars. The site promotes its offerings as a "third space" for community, creativity, and curated services. I built a mobile-friendly React site to spotlight Patreon tiers, grazing board orders, and bookings for lifestyle services.

Tools Used

ReactViteTailwind CSSLucide IconsFramer Motion
